Path<T>
A class to represent a path through the graph (from a source to a destination) produced from a game.
PelletGraph
A class representing the graph needed to traverse in order to find the order of pellets to eat (that takes the shortest amount of moves/time).

RandomAgent
 
SearchAgent
A class representing an Agent that uses a graph traversal algorithm for route planning between Coordinates on the map.
ThriftyPelletEater
A class to represent an entity that seeks to eat all the pellets in a pacman maze as quickly as possible.
